Perceptor:

Perceptor transformed to his beast mode (a transmetal mole)and dug a 
tunnel. Soon he was undergwond and he sent a encoded message to 
FLicker.

"Try to move a way the hostage this Maximal's scumb... I'm  going to 
help you "  

And send this message to Sharpclaws, Kitkat, and Carnatron.

"Try to keep the Maximals Away of Flicker and the Hostage... IF we 
falied Hydras will skin us alive all..."




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, aerosmith4e@a... wrote:
>  Hydras landed with a bang. He shot a fireball from each dragon 
head at

do this!" He 
> pulled out his two swords and stood ready."
> Carnatron turned into Rodimus and fired shots at 
aeroutar. "Flicker run! Ill 
> cover you" he sent him telepathicly
> > Nightlight::

could
